PHRASE.LANG: This live action shot is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Picture of Perfection Award" for winning 500 or more coins in one race. [#Legal]

Cette photo d'action en direct est une récompense de "A Day At The Races" article course de chevaux. C'est le "Picture of Perfection Award" pour gagner plus de 500 pièces de monnaie dans une course. [#Legal]
This live action shot is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Picture of Perfection Award" for winning 500 or more coins in one race. [#Legal]
